project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a simple contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts while storing data in a JSON file.

task.name: Implement functionality to add contacts to the JSON file
Implement functionality to search for contacts
Implement functionality to update existing contacts
Implement functionality to delete contacts from the JSON file
Write tests for each of the above functionalities
Execute tests on all implemented functionalities to ensure that they function correctly
